attributes.action: Scrap poor-deal PFIs now or wave goodbye to the NHS - it's a simple choice.
attributes.background: Huddersfield HRI A&E will close to finance the bad PFI deal at Calderdale - a hospital that took £64m to build and will eventually cost taxpayers £774m. PFI Investors have already had their investments back many times - we should not be shovelling OUR public money into private pockets any more.

rejection.details: It's not clear whether you would like the Government to end all PFI contracts within the NHS, or only certain contracts which offer a poor deal. You could start a new petition asking clearly for the action you would like the Government to take.
